LanguageData.Bluebird.label: bluebird
LanguageData.Bluebird.description: A small songbird with vibrant blue plumage.
LanguageData.Bluebird.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Bluebird.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Bluebird.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Crow.label: crow
LanguageData.Crow.description: Intelligent black birds with complex social structures. With a little patience, crows can be trained to perform a number of fairly complex tasks.
LanguageData.Crow.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Crow.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Crow.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Flamingo.label: flamingo
LanguageData.Flamingo.description: A wading bird known for their vibrant pink plumage. Their long legs are well adapted to shallow waters.
LanguageData.Flamingo.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Flamingo.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Flamingo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Heron.label: heron
LanguageData.Heron.description: Long-legged and long-necked birds. They tend to live in marshy habitats.
LanguageData.Heron.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Heron.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Heron.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Macaw.label: macaw
LanguageData.Macaw.description: A parrot known for its intelligence and its brilliant plumage.
LanguageData.Macaw.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Macaw.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Macaw.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Peacock.label: peacock
LanguageData.Peacock.description: Large birds with extravagant plumage. Male peacocks use their tail feathers in elaborate courtship displays.
LanguageData.Peacock.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Peacock.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Peacock.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Penguin.label: penguin
LanguageData.Penguin.description: A flightless bird adept at surviving in cold regions. Their black and white plumage and waddling gait make them unmistakable. They are deadly hunters in the water, but slow and vulnerable on land.
LanguageData.Penguin.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Penguin.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Penguin.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Quail.label: quail
LanguageData.Quail.description: Small plump ground-dwelling birds with a distinctive plume.
LanguageData.Quail.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Quail.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Quail.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Sparrow.label: sparrow
LanguageData.Sparrow.description: Small birds that often travel in flocks. They can thrive in a variety of environments.
LanguageData.Sparrow.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Sparrow.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Sparrow.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Swan.label: swan
LanguageData.Swan.description: Large graceful waterfowl known for their beauty, and their surprising ferocity.
LanguageData.Swan.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Swan.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Swan.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Vulture.label: vulture
LanguageData.Vulture.description: Scavengers with strong beaks and broad wings. Their strong stomach acid allows them to eat rotting corpses.
LanguageData.Vulture.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.Vulture.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Vulture.tools.head.label: head
